black.text:

at Crystal's last
party?

What's the first sign
of simulation
sickness?

_______: The latest
in VR technology.

ovens using _______.

_______ live in VR!

_______ Again!

Wow! Obama has

Again!

use to threaten a
small child?

I brought home

When life gives you
_______, make
_______.

_______, I'll just
use _______ instead.

Hey, would you

Who's your _______?

Wait, you have wood

made of _______!
What is the safeword?
How's your _______?

_______ just tastes
so good!

Scientists recently
discovered a new
element, which

_______.

_______ for
president!

One time, I shoved

ear!

Nooo! You can't leave

_______!

My favorite boyscout

_______ badge.

May I tell you

Tonight we have
a nice _______.

_______.

Sometimes I like to

and pretend I

white.text:
The early signs
of simulation
sickness.

Putting your Vive
wand through
a $5000 TV.

Feeling just a little
bit moist.

Cramming a baby
in a toaster.

Pushing someone
down a flight
of stairs.

Lighting a homeless
persons cardboard
box on fire.

Putting a can of
Dr Pepper© in your
anus and whispering
"The doctor is in."

A dagger made out
of a toothbrush.

A member of the
kool-kids klub.

A secret that isn't
a secret anymore.
